mapper.select: SELECT a.student_id ,RPAD(b.student_name,12,' ') as student_name ,b.student_gender ,b.student_birthdate ,a.participate_status ,b.STUDENT_PROFILE FROM ATTENDEE_TABLE a LEFT OUTER JOIN STUDENT_TABLE b ON(a.student_id = b.student_id ) WHERE a.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND a.ACADEMY_ID =#{academyId} ORDER BY a.participate_status
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDEE_TABLE SET participate_status = #{participateStatus}, update_user =#{updateUser},update_date =sysdate WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} AND CLASS_ID =#{classId} AND ACADEMY_ID = #{academyId}
